title: kokkaru kOvE
sahitya:
kokkaru kOvE sikkaru guruvE kumarA amarAdhipanE


anupallavi

  pakkuvamAip-pazha vinai nIngip-pati pashu pAshap-paNbai viLakkik-


caraNam    tenral maruvum tEn malar pOlE tEnuNDisaikkum vaNDugaL pOlE manral koNDa
maNamanam pOlE mAsaru shuddhAnandam vaLara pEasrum inbam perugiDa nALum
